== Installation ==
Follow the steps to set up SafeStrap Recovery.  Reboot into Recovery and set up RomSlot 4 with a 2GB data partition.  Install the final quantal preview of ubuntu rootfs http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-touch-preview/quantal/monthly-04.1/quantal-preinstalled-phablet-armhf.zip followed by the phablet image and reboot. (Raring and later versions will not boot.)

=== Unlocking instructions ===
The device first needs to be rooted. Use Motofail: http://vulnfactory.org/blog/2012/02/11/rooting-the-droid-4-a-failed-bounty-experiment/ (Other root methods may no longer work.)

Motorola devices have a locked bootloader so custom ROMs are installed using SafeStrap Recovery.  Details on it's use can be found here: http://blog.hash-of-codes.com/how-to-safestrap/

=== link to images ===
http://goo.im/devs/Hashcode/solana/ubuntu-phablet

== Known issues ==
* Low memory issues
* Camera is completely disabled for this kernel (lack of vendor support)
